title: 20 - What You Think About God Matters with Dr. Glenn Kreider
description:
This will be one of your favorite episodes to date, I promise. Dr. K has been one of the most influential people in my faith and you're going to love what he has to say about what theology really is, why it matters, and how you can have bigger, deeper conversations about God that will change your life.

Find Dr. Kreider's book I talk about here: https://www.amazon.com/God-Us-Exploring-Interactions-throughout-ebook/dp/B00PKKNKTS

The audio Bible app we talk about all the time: dwellapp.io/madeforthis
